item.title: Why aren't these teleports working?
item.dc:creator: @Xile_Maizez Xile Maizez
item.description:
@Xile_Maizez wrote:

Hey everyone, I’m trying to make a couple of the Normal Spellbook teleports work, but only Varrock and Falador teleports are going where i want them to. The other teleports only animate, and dont even go to where I want it to.

These are the codes I have.

[code] public void TeleTo(String s, int level) {
teleX = absX;
teleY = absY;
newheightLevel = heightLevel;
checkwildy();

    if (teleblock == false && actionTimer <= 7) {

        if (s == "Varrock") {
            teleX = 2965;
            teleY = 3379;
            addSkillXP((20 * playerLevel[6]), 6);
            newheightLevel = 0;
        }

        if (s == "Falador") {
            teleX = 2662;
            teleY = 3307;
            addSkillXP((30 * playerLevel[6]), 6);
            newheightLevel = 0;             
        }
        if (s == "Lumby") {
            teleX = 2908;
            teleY = 9693;
            addSkillXP((40 * playerLevel[6]), 6);
            newheightLevel = 0;
        }

        if (s == "Camelot") {
            teleX = 3298;
            teleY = 3650;
            addSkillXP((50 * playerLevel[6]), 6);
            newheightLevel = 0;
        }
        if (s == "Ardougne") {
            teleX = 2980;
            teleY = 3400;
            addSkillXP((120 * playerLevel[6]), 6);
            newheightLevel = 0;
        }

        if (s == "Watchtower") {
            teleX = 3233;
            teleY = 2902;
            addSkillXP((150 * playerLevel[6]), 6);
            newheightLevel = 0;
    
        }

        if (s == "Trollheim") {
            teleX = 3163;
            teleY = 4817;
            addSkillXP((400 * playerLevel[6]), 6);
            newheightLevel = 0;
        }[/code]

Now these are the Cases I have.

[code]case 4140: //Varrock teleport

if(teleblock == true){
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”);
}
else
{
setAnimation(714);
stillgfx(301, absY, absX);
teleportToX = 2965;
teleportToY = 3378;
}
break;

case 4146: //Falador Teleport

if(teleblock ==true) {
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”);
}
else
{
setAnimation(714);
stillgfx(301, absY, absX);
teleportToX = 2662;
teleportToY = 3307;
}
break;

case 4143: // Lumbridge Teleport

if(teleblock ==true) {
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”);
}
else
{
setAnimation(714);
stillgfx(301, absY, absX);
teleX = 2908;
teleY = 9693;
}
break;

case 4150: // Cammelot Teleport

if(teleblock ==true) {
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”);
}
else
{
setAnimation(714);
stillgfx(301, absY, absX);
teleX = 3298;
teleY = 3650;
}
break;

case 6004: // Adrougne Teleport

if(teleblock ==true) {
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”);
}
else
{
setAnimation(714);
stillgfx(301, absY, absX);
teleX = 2980;
teleY = 3400;
}
break;

case 6005: // Watchtower Teleprt

if(teleblock ==true) {
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”);
}
else
{
setAnimation(714);
stillgfx(301, absY, absX);
teleX = 3233;
teleY = 2902;
}
break;

case 29031: // Trollheim Teleport

if(teleblock ==true) {
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”);
}
else
{
setAnimation(714);
stillgfx(301, absY, absX);
teleX = 3163;
teleY = 4817;
}
break;[/code]

Can anyone tell me why the other spells dont go to where they are suppose to go?
Thanks.
